name: Loathsome Piano
description:
loathsome piano

welcome to the Cold Place. i am, well, i don't really know. i can't remember my name, if i even had one to begin with. it's difficult to remember things here. one thing i do remember is that i live here, and this is the Cold Place. the Others, they know me as the loathsome piano.

some musical garbage made in a few hours by me, that was based on a dream.
